title: Pay and grading for Childrens Social Work staff

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the following information regarding pay and grading for social work staff in Childrens Services within your Local Authority:
Pay grade and NJC spinal column point and numbers of staff and any enhancement available at each pay point:
Newley Qualified Social Worker
Social Worker
Senior Social Worker
Advanced Practitioner
Team Manager
Please provide the information using table headings below:
Job Title	Grade	SCP	Number of staff	Value of any enhancement payable
Yours faithfully,
warren dillon

Dear Warren Dillon,
Thank you for your request for information relating to pay and grading for
Childrens Social Work staff which we received on 11/08/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 11/09/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ

Dear Warren Dillon,
Thank you for your request for information relating to pay and grading for
Childrens Social Work staff which we received on 11/08/2023.
We apologise for the delay in responding.
Please find our response below.
Please see attachment. Please note that the SCP has been suppressed as
disclosure of this information could potentially identify the individuals
involved, especially if combined with other data. Therefore, this
information is exempt from disclosure under section 40(2) of the Freedom
of Information Act 2000 on the grounds that it is personal data and its
disclosure would contravene the data protection principle under Article
5(1)(a) of the General Data Protection Regulation that processing of
personal data must be fair, lawful and transparent.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council

Sheffield, S1 1UJ
